entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test failure in System.Transactions.Tests.OleTxTests.Volatile_and_durable_enlistments #73874
  • dotnet executable should be signed with same identifier across versions on macOS #73873
  • Test failure: WasmTestOnBrowser-subtlecrypto-System.Security.Cryptography.Tests #73872
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger]Fix behavior about setting breakpoints on hidden lines #73867
    8.0.0
  • .NET 7.0 Preview 7 Microbenchmarks Performance Study Report #73866
  • [API Proposal]: RandomDataGenerator #73864
    Future
  • System.Numerics.Tests.Perf_VectorOf<*>.* has Regressed for Mono Interpreter Ubuntu 18.04 #73863
  • X509Chain sometimes fails to build with store certificates in CI #73862
    Future
  • System.IO.Tests.Perf_File.Delete has Regressed for the Mono Interpreter Ubuntu 18.04 and WASM #73861
  • RuntimeType.GetGenericTypeDefinition() performance issue #73860
    Future
  • [wasm] Tracking issue for removing crypto worker #73858
    7.0.0
  • generic mathematics interfaces should use nullable reference types #73855
    7.0.0
  • Test failure: baseservices/threading/coverage/OSThreadId/osthreadid/osthreadid.sh #73854
  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System.Net.Security #73851
    7.0.0
  • Source-build fails to build w/CS0208: Cannot take the address of, get the size of, or declare a pointer to a managed type #73850
    7.0.0
  • Add tests with LoopbackServer for web sockets #73849
  • SocketsHttpHandler.MaxResponseHeadersLength can cause internal 32-bit overflow with HTTP/2 #73848
  • [API Proposal]: Utf8Formatter/Utf8Parser should have UInt128 and Int128 overloads #73842
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Use a latest stable Chrome, or close to it for running tests #73835
    8.0.0
  • tsan (thread sanitizer) failures on x86_64 from clang14 #73833
    8.0.0
  • DependencyInjectionEventSource Memory leak #73832
  • Strange ASP.NET Core behavior with advanced runtime features #73828
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System.Reflection #72405
    7.0.0
  • Testing GitHub issue creation - disregard this issue #73875
  • Type validation holes when using Reflection to invoke a method with a void* parameter. #7430
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: add a setter to TransactionManager.DefaultTimeout and MaxTimeout #59282
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Numerics.Tests.op_rightshiftTest.RunRightShiftTests #67411
    7.0.0
  • System.AccessViolationException in JIT compilation (.NET 7) #73821
    7.0.0
  • `sudo dotnet workload --help` segfaults on Apple M1 in .NET 7 Preview 6 #72308
    7.0.0
  • Fix NRT annotations on `XmlProcessingInstruction` #71862
    7.0.0
  • [Perf] Changes at 7/5/2022 10:32:06 PM #72030
    8.0.0
  • RegionInfo.CurrentRegion.ISOCurrencySymbol returns XDR on iOS device #73464
    8.0.0
  • Test failure Regressions/coreclr/GitHub_16833/Test16833/Test16833.sh #66568
    7.0.0
  • System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture returns InvariantCulture on iOS #73512
  • BigInteger.Parse returns bogus value for exponents above 1000 #17296
    Future
  • API Proposal: XmlResolver.NullResolver #73637
    7.0.0
  • API Proposal: Obsolete XmlSecureResolver #73636
    7.0.0
  • Libraries continuous improvement work planned for .NET 7 #57209
    7.0.0
  • System.Buffers work planned for .NET 7 #64598
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProviderMetadataTests.ProviderNameTests(noProviderName: True) #52426
    Future
  • Rename `up-for-grabs` to `help wanted` #71496
    7.0.0
  • XML attribute is read as a null IConfigurationSection.Value starting in 6.0.0 #70733
    6.0.x
  • [API Proposal]: Expose signature and protected headers raw bytes #72611
    7.0.0
  • New Socket.Select TimeSpan-based overload is broken for Timeout.InfiniteTimeSpan #72458
    7.0.0
  • [tvOS][iOS] System.Numerics.Tests.GetBitLengthTests.RunGetBitLengthTestsLarge - OutOfMemory #73623
    8.0.0
  • How delete entry from Tar archive? #73458
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add a property or method that can be used to check if there is an error in the process #73709
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Improve RateLimiter metrics #71804
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Performance/CodeQuality/Inlining/NoThrowInline/NoThrowInline.sh #60324
    7.0.0
  • WebSockets over HTTP/2 issues #72301
    7.0.0
  • Constrained execution behavior change in .net7 preview 6 #73606
    7.0.0
  • [Documentation] Add docs explaining the differences between Regex Source generator vs the inbox engines when using RegexOptions.IgnoreCase #70214
    7.0.0
  • OpenSslCachedSystemStoreProvider: Determine readlink result whether should be validated or not #73815
  • [wasm] AOT compilation failing for System.Private.CoreLib in System.Runtime.Tests #73474
    7.0.0
  • DateTimeFormat.FirstDayOfWeek inconsistent behaviour #73837
  • HttpConnectionPool violates HttpHeaders thread-safety for CONNECT tunnels #65379
    7.0.0
  • Can not get NullabilityInfo of out/ref parameters #72320
    Future
  • [MONO][TEST] Android arm64 Runtime tests run.sh doesn't use the right script name #73510
    8.0.0
  • Getting a runtime crash with the interpreter and 7.0 Preview 7 #72635
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add leaveOpen concept to PartitionedRateLimiter.TranslateKey #72551
    7.0.0
  • Zip and Tar don't (re)store directory permissions #71140
    7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Randomizing guard stack cookie not supported on some Unix platforms #73695
    Future
  • Search in Documents folder does not work as expected #71870
    Future
  • String interpolation with invariant culture #73639
  • [wasm-mt] Add a System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.BrowserSynchronizationContext #69409
    7.0.0
  • Implement distributed/promoted transactions in System.Transactions for Windows only #715
    7.0.0
  • NativeAOT in .NET 7 #61231
    7.0.0
  • Test failure baseservices/threading/threadstatic/threadstatic07/threadstatic07.sh #73830
  • Arm64: Regressions in System.IO.Compression.Brotli #69563
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Make the property `DataContractSerializer.SerializationSurrogateProvider` public #65826
  • MethodInfo.MakeGenericMethod() used for testing throws MissingRuntimeArtifactException on NativeAOT leg #73811
  • Test failure System.Net.Security.Tests.LoggingTest.EventSource_EventsRaisedAsExpected #67633
    7.0.0
  • Missing.Value corner-case behavior changes in .NET 7 #73106
    7.0.0
  • ilasm round-trip test failures #70875
    7.0.0
  • `JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.Arm.AdvSimd` segfaults on ` mono llvmfullaot Pri0 Runtime Tests Run Linux arm64 release` #69330
    7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Runtime Directives (rd.xml) file not applied? #72989
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix arm64 scalar intrinsic use with small arguments #73876
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Product dependencies in Versions.props must be on the latest patch version for libraries dependencies #73871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Remove ActiveIssue for Matrix4x4CreateFromAxisAngleTest #73870
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Avoid unused NetEventSource code #73868
    area-System.Net
  • Add jit stress random #73859
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Clean up temp directory methods in System.ComponentModel.Composition tests #73857
    area-System.ComponentModel.Composition
  • noop change to see what can pass CI #73856
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • EnableAOTAnalyzer for Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting #73853
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [LoongArch64] amend the tests' building on LA64. #73840
    NO-MERGE, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Obsolete outdated Visual Basic API #73838
    new-api-needs-documentation

Merged

  • Add ManifestMsiVersion to CreateVisualStudioWorkload call #73877
  • Optimize `AssemblyLoadContext.LoadFromStream` and fix partial reads. #72783
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Follow up changes for the suspension loop routine. #73741
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Unblock System.Configuration CI test errors for Android,tvOS,iOS #73852
    area-System.Configuration, disabled-test, 7.0.0
  • Support void* to UIntPtr parameter conversion for Invoked method #73748
    area-System.Reflection
  • Disable more ILASM roundtrip tests #73831
    area-ILTools-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add AllBitsSet DIM #72961
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add annotations to System.Private.DataContractSerialization #73337
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Update internal tool restore service connection #73869
    blocking-official-build, area-Infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • JIT: Fix STORE_DYN_BLK morphing #73844
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Handle web socket downgrade when HTTP/2 not enabled #73843
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Fix NRT annotations for XmlProcessingInstruction #73687
    area-System.Xml, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Update all of the net 6 packs to be labeled .net6 #73733
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Remove executable bits from generated shared libs #73686
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix BigInteger.Parse returning incorrect values for exponents above 1000 #73643
    area-System.Numerics
  • Obsolete XmlSecureResolver #73676
    Security, area-System.Xml, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Only include host.native instead of host in default clr/mono subsets #73800
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] Respect the Keep-Alive response header on HTTP/1.0 #73245
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.9
  • Rename 'up-for-grabs' label to 'help wanted' #73810
    documentation, area-Meta, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix hang caused by calling Environment.FailFast on multiple threads #72567
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 6.0.9
  • COSE: Add APIs needed for countersign #73796
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact, 7.0.0
  • Fix component model aot test #73734
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • support InfiniteTimeSpan in Select #73204
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 7.0.0
  • Respect the Keep-Alive response header on HTTP/1.1 as well #73585
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Mark RunGetBitLengthTestsLarge as outerloop and skipped on iOS/tvOS/Android/Browser #73773
    area-System.Numerics
  • [RateLimiting] Add statistics API #72306
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • No end stream on ws connect and flush every message #73762
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Adding documentation explaining case-insensitive behavior across engines #73814
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [wasm] Disable some tests on NodeJS/Windows #73834
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [Ppc64le] Added memory patch thunking for function calls #73616
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution, arch-ppc64le
  • Access the User-Agent for CONNECT tunnels early #73331
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Update to arcade SDK '6.0.0-beta.22411.3' BAR 144406 #73841
  • Improve NullabilityInfoContext behavior for ByRef types. #73520
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Handle Stream.Length for devices #73708
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [debugger] First draft of managed debugger on wasi #67272
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Port Windows/MSDTC distributed transactions support #72051
    area-System.Transactions
  • Fix build error in mini-ppc.h #73845
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono][jit] Don't inflate Mono.ValueTuple with byrefs #73689
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Ensure partial Vector256 acceleration is still possible on AVX only hardware #73720
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Log as warning in interop generator when method signature is not supported #71477
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 7.0.0
  • [RateLimiting] Update TranslateKey to allow disposal of wrapped limiter #73160
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • EnableAOTAnalyzer for Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection #73829
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Tar: restore directory permissions while extracting. #72078
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add FEATURE_READONLY_GS_COOKIE for NativeAOT #73744
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Prevent devirtualization into unallocated types #73839
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Introduce a default synchronization context for wasm #72652
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Fix repro project for Release builds #73836
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix `IBinaryInteger.Read***Endian` to accept a `ReadOnlySpan<byte>`. #73802
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution

Updated

  • run tests agains staging helix queues #73740
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Quic
  • DCS alignment to 4.8 with schema support #71752
    area-Serialization, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • ignore name mismatch when IgnoreInvalidName is set #73745
    area-System.Net.Security
  • 66163 fatal error xml serializer immutable array #73729
    area-Serialization, 7.0.0
  • Bring back readability lost in .Net 6, and stop emitting BOM. #73731
    area-Serialization, 7.0.0
  • avoid allocation of SafeFreeSslCredentials and SafeDeleteSslContext on Linux #69527
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • Allow for null XmlSerialziers when loading pre-gen from mappings. #73827
    area-Serialization, 7.0.0
  • Implement IXmlTextWriterInitializer on the async writer wrapper. #73730
    area-Serialization, 7.0.0
  • Improve XmlDictionaryWriter UTF8 encoding performance #73336
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • NativeAOT: Guarded devirtualization #64497
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make public EventBookmark's constructor and BookmarkText property #73548
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix `DataContractJsonSerializer`'s handling of -0.0 #69020
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Add tests and improve binary XmlDictionaryReader performance #73332
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Fix unnecessary failure when Crossgen'ing dll's without proper Debug Directory data #73824
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Remove ThreadPool native implementation #71719
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Removing console.debug message helper to make debugger work. #72812
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] Support parameters of type Enum with icalls #73817
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Breakpoint set in a invalid line, set it to the next available line #73189
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] cleanup testing and host support in templatest and tests #73785
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [metadata] Do less initialization in mono_class_is_assignable #73786
    area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.0
  • [NativeAot] Enable a couple more libs tests #73756
    area-System.Net
  • Update for recent compiler changes for ref fields #73466
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Port IndexOfAny(ref char, char[1-5], int) to Vector128/256 #73469
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Vectorize LastIndexOf and LastIndexOfAnyExcept without code duplication #73768
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Memory
  • Add CancellationToken-accepting overloads for SendPingAsync #72338
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Repoint urls in docs #73766
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix issue#37970 #73552
    area-Serialization
  • Optimize the SqlGuid struct #72549
    area-System.Data.SqlClient, community-contribution
  • [wasm-mt] Use asset loading for dotnet.worker.js; update WasmAppBuilder #73697
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Clean up AOT publish process #73416
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove redundant trimmer warning suppressions #73238
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Add intrinsic for SpanHelpers.Char.IndexOfAny on AArch64 #73788
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • [PERF][MAUI] Update Maui builds to use dotnet rc1 and new dotnet version flow #73624
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Handle http version > 3.0 #73461
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • [Android] gRPC client tests #73060
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Adding support to receive evaluationOptions from dap. #71464
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix auto layout algorithm to compute structure alignment correctly #73738
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [QUIC] Stress crash WIP #72769
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Add new version of the ContentionStart event #72627
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Arm64: Add If conversion pass #73472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Unmanaged structs are considered blittable if module has `DisableRuntimeMarshallingAttribute` #73310
    arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono, 7.0.0
  • [mono][jit] box+callvirt optimization #73456
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • WIP: Verify correctness of using mono llvmfullaot with interpreter as a fallback instead of GSHAREDVTs #72443
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Some SIMD-related cleanup #73819
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Remove unnecessary runtime lookup for constrained callvirt #73823
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [mono] Don't truncate the high bits when ldelema index is nint #73799
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • System.Net.WebProxy Bypass regex list optimization #73803
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Throw if MethodDesc::GetName() returns null #73760
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update heap hard limit for large pages #73508
    area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add guard word before local var CMiniColDef[9] #73736
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] delete the emitIns_R_R_Imm(). #73509
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 8.0.0
  • Convert MemoryMarshal.GetArrayDataReference to a JIT intrinsic #72725
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
